hero-page.subtitle: Turi sitidiyo yo mu Budage ishinzwe iterambere ry'ubuhanga ikoresha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu gukora imikino ya videwo, porogaramu, n'ibindi bitangazamakuru bishimishije kandi bigezweho kuri buri wese.

download-page.title: Manura
download-page.subtitle: Hano ushobora kumanura no kureba imishinga yacu

tiers.description11: Kwinjira mu buryo bwimbitse muri kode n'igishushanyo cyacu
tiers.description12: Guhura imbona nkubone n'abateza imbere bacu
tiers.description13: Biboneka ku isi yose kuri YouTube
tiers.description21: Gukina ku buntu nta kiguzi gihishe
tiers.description23: Umukino woroshye w'igihe cyose n'umunsi wose
tiers.description30: Biboneka kuri Windows, Macos na Linux
tiers.description31: Bigurishirizwa kuri Steam na Apple Store

faq.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
faq.subtitle1: Nagera gute ku bafasha abakiriya niba mfite ikibazo cyangwa ingorane?
faq.description1: Ushobora kugera ku itsinda ryacu rishinzwe gufasha abakiriya wohereje imeri kuri:
faq.subtitle2: Ni iki gituma igicuruzwa cyanyu gitandukana n'ibindi ku isoko?
faq.description2: Igicuruzwa cyacu gitandukanywa n'ubushobozi bwacyo bwo guhinduka, kuramba, n'ibintu bishya biranga. Dushyira imbere kunyurwa k'umukoresha kandi duhora duharanira kurenga ibyateganijwe mu nzego zose.
faq.description3: Uradufasha iyo ugerageje imishinga yacu ukayisangiza abandi. Ushobora no kwiyandikisha ku muyoboro wacu wa YouTube ugasabana n'umuryango mugari. Ku nkunga yisumbuye, ushobora no kuduha impano unyuze kuri PayPal.

feature-page.title: Ibiranga
feature-page.subheader: Menya ibiranga porogaramu yacu bituma iba yihariye.

items.title: Igishushanyo Mbonera cya Terefone
items.description: Porogaramu yacu yateguwe hibandwa kuri terefone, bigatuma ikora neza ku bikoresho byose.

items.title: Imbonerahamwe Yumvikana
items.description: Imbonerahamwe isobanutse kandi itunganije neza iguha ishusho rusange mu kanya gato.

items.title: Gukorana n'Ibikoresho Bitandukanye
items.description: Ishimire uburyo ikora neza kandi ikomeye haba kuri mudasobwa, tableti, cyangwa telefone.

article.title: Itangazo ry'umushinga mushya
article.description: Turatangaza ko umushinga wacu mushya uzaba umukino wa videwo wa mudasobwa w'ubuntu uzakora kuri sisitemu zose n'imbuga zose.
article.author: Michael Schenk, Umutezimbere

article.title: Urubuga rushya
article.description: Turatangaza ko urubuga rwacu rwamaze kujya ahagaragara kandi rukaba rusange.
article.author: Michael Schenk, Umutezimbere

article.title: TouchSlider yageze ku isoko
article.description: Turatangaza ko umukino wacu wa videwo wa telefone TouchSlider uboneka ku buntu kuri IOS na Android.
article.author: Michael Schenk, Umutezimbere

principles-page.title: Amahame yacu
principles-page.subheader: Izi ndangagaciro nizo nkingi ya mwamba y'ibyo dukora byose, uhereye ku murongo wa mbere wa kode kugeza ku buryo umukoresha wa nyuma abibona.

items.title: Kugera Hose
items.description: Twemera ko porogaramu nziza igomba gukorera buri wese, ku gikoresho cyose. Imishinga yacu yateguwe neza kugira ngo ikorane n'imbuga zitandukanye kandi igere kuri bose kuva mu ntangiriro.

items.title: Kunoze kandi Gukora Neza
items.description: Dutanga uburyo bwuzuye kandi bwanoze cyane. Kwibanda kwacu ku miterere isobanutse n'igeragezwa rikomeye bituma buri gicuruzwa gihamye, gikora neza, kandi giteguye gukoreshwa kuva ku munsi wa mbere.

items.title: Igishushanyo Cyumvikana
items.description: Twemera ko porogaramu ikomeye idakwiye kuba igoye. Ishyaka ryacu riri mu gukora imbonerahamwe zisobanutse, zumvikana zituma buri gikorwa cyoroha kandi gishimisha.

items.title: Gushingira ku Bumenyi Bushya
items.description: Twubaka dutekereza ku hazaza. Dukoresheje ikoranabuhanga rishya mu bya porogaramu n'ibikoresho, dukora ibicuruzwa bitekereza ku hazaza bifite imikorere ikomeye, igezweho.

items.title: Ubufasha Bwihariye
items.description: Umubano wacu ntugarukira ku kumanura. Dutanga ubufasha bwiza, bwihuse buturutse mu itsinda ryacu kugira ngo tumenye neza ko uhora unyurwa n'ibicuruzwa byacu.

items.title: Ubuhanga Bw'intyoza
items.description: Twemera ko ubuhanga buri mu tuntu duto. Uhereye ku gitekerezo cya mbere kugeza ku murongo wa nyuma wa kode, buri gice cy'akazi kacu gitegurwa neza kandi gikorwa neza kugira ngo igicuruzwa cya nyuma kibe cyiza.

testimonials-page.title: Ubuhamya
testimonials-page.subheader: Reba icyo abakiriya bacu, abatezimbere, n'abagerageza bakunda ku bicuruzwa byacu.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Nkunda cyane uburyo iki gicuruzwa gikora ibintu byinshi! Byaba mu mishinga y'akazi cyangwa mu byo nkunda gukora, gihinduka bitagoranye kijyanye n'ibyo nkeneye. Igishushanyo cyacyo cyumvikana cyatumye imirimo yanjye ya buri munsi iba myiza kurushaho, ikorwa neza kandi ishimishije.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Kimwe mu bintu by'ingenzi biranga iki gicuruzwa ni ubufasha bwiza cyane ku bakiriya. Nk'uko nabibonye, itsinda riri inyuma y'iki gicuruzwa ryasubije vuba kandi rirafasha cyane. Birahumuriza kumenya ko bashyigikiye igicuruzwa cyabo.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Uburyo iki gicuruzwa cyoroshye kandi cyoroshye gukoresha byoroheje cyane ubuzima bwanjye. Nshimira abagikoze kuba baratanze igisubizo kidahura gusa n'ibyo abakoresha bakeneye, ahubwo kirenzeho.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Nshima uburyo bitaye ku tuntu duto mu gishushanyo cy'iki gicuruzwa. Utuntu duto tugira itandukaniro rinini, kandi biragaragara ko abagikoze bibanze ku gutanga uburyo bwiza cyane.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Nagerageje ibindi bicuruzwa bisa, ariko iki gitandukanywa n'ibintu bishya biranga. Biragaragara ko abagikoze batekereje cyane ku gukora igisubizo gihura neza n'ibyo abakoresha bakeneye.

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ubwiza bw'iki gicuruzwa burenze ibyo natekerezaga. Kiraramba, giteguwe neza, kandi cyubatswe kugira ngo kimare igihe. Rwose gikwiye ishoramari.
